title: Recruiting members for my team!
body:
We just want the Conquering Ward :> for fun. If youre looking for a serious team this isnt one. We play for fun, if you are interested of joining please add and message me about it. (Must have Curse or Skype or Teamspeak)

Needed: Jungler, Toplaner , and Midlaner.

replies.body:
Strong Top: Renekton, Gnar, rumble

Best role - Mid: Zed, Azir, Fizz, Talon, Veigar, lux

Can jungle pretty good: Shaco, Rengar, lee sin



Gold V - Dont really take the game seriously
Jgler Shaco, Kha, Xin, Yi etc
Im a decent top lane and a good lad to have a lough with, definitely keen to join
Hey ill join, i'm a good midlaner and i have all communications! ill join i dont mind if no room though! Add me on bro's account at the moment, Wolfiehunter!
